model.shaders

Class ShaderProgram

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.shaders.ShaderProgram
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EntityShader, GuiShader, SkyboxShader, TerrainShader

    public abstract class ShaderProgram
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class representing a shader program.

    A shader program is a delegate between java and the open gl glsl shader

    Author:
    Marcel van Workum - 300313949
